name: Chunky Tomato
description:
While delivering tomatoes to a chunky tomato factory, a crate tips over and breaks. A tomato rolls across the floor. In fact, it has legs and just realizes what's going on and rushes toward the factory fence. Behind the fence, a busy road awaits her. But behind it is a peaceful forest! It's up to you whether she makes it or still becomes a chunky tomato.


  • Before you unlock the goal on the other side of the road, you need to collect stars on the road.
  • On the road, not only cars are a danger. There are various obstacles that try to stop you (nails, broken glass, chewing gum...).
  • However, there is also help. Drops are scattered on the road, which will help you to improve.
  • Survive a total of 40 levels, the difficulty of which increases with each level.
  • The distribution of stars and obstacles is random, so each level is individual.
